snippet: An explosion heard across Kabul on Tuesday morning appeared aimed at killing a prominent ethnic Hazara politician as he was traveling in his armored convoy.
abstract: Roadside bomb apparently aimed at Afghan politician Hajji Muhammad Mohaqeq explodes in Kabul, killing three civilians; Mohaqeq escapes uninjured.

byline.original: By ALISSA J. RUBIN and SHARIFULLAH SAHAK

lead_paragraph: An explosion heard across Kabul on Tuesday morning appeared aimed at killing a prominent ethnic Hazara politician as he was traveling in his armored convoy.

headline.main: Blast Apparently Aimed at an Afghan Politician Kills 3 in Kabul
headline.print_headline: Blast Apparently Aimed at an Afghan Politician Kills 3 in Kabul
